Key Match Events: Wales led 2-0 at halftime before Iceland's comeback
Logi Tomasson scored an equalizer and Danny Ward scored an own goal
Orri Oskarsson had a strong performance with key saves
Post-Match Reflections: Craig Bellamy praised the team's resilience and lessons learned
Wales extended their unbeaten Nations League start
Iceland manager Age Hareide was disappointed with the late equalizer
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played on a freezing night
Wales' joint top spot in Group B4 was affected by the draw
Iceland's comeback was a significant moment
